name: e (digitalmouse12)
description:
e- is an arcade-style, twin-stick shooter game. Play as an electron who must protect its nucleus from incoming Antimatter. 

How To Play
  • Defend the Nucleus
  • Fire atomic energy at the Antimatter
  • Restore energy to electron shells by collecting Photons
  • Jump to nearby shells for new forms of energy
  • Use an Atomic Pulse to destroy all Antimatter within the shells
  • Can you reach the end of the Periodic Table?
Controls
  • Left Stick -- Move
  • Right Stick -- Aim
  • R1 (RB) -- Fire
  • R2 (RT) -- Fire
  • Square (X) -- Atomic Pulse
  • L1 (LB) -- Jump in
  • L2 (LT) -- Jump out
Requirements
  • Windows / macOS
  • PS (ideal) / Xbox / Switch Pro Controller
Credits
  • A game by Glenn Francisco & Kevin Portelli
  • Programming -- Glenn
  • Music / Sound -- Kevin
Feedback
